text: @ImranKhanPTI heard you are sending COVID19 patients to PoJK, Imran? and another 15-year-old Hindu girl was abducted, raped and married off to her abductor yesterday, in Bhawalpur. How do you sleep at night, as the leader of an Islamo-fascist genocidal military-theocratic state?
